| 1 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> A e. RR ) |

| 5 | 4 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ /\ ( A mod M ) < ( M - 1 ) ) -> ( A e. RR /\ 1 e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_modaddmod | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ 1 e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( A mod M ) + 1 ) mod M ) = ( ( A + 1 ) mod M ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ /\ ( A mod M ) < ( M - 1 ) ) -> ( ( ( A mod M ) + 1 ) mod M ) = ( ( A + 1 ) mod M ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_modcl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod M ) e. RR ) |

| 18 |  | #P_rpre | |- ( M e. RR+ -> M e. RR ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> M e. RR ) |
| 20 | 8, 2, 19 | #P_ltaddsubd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( A mod M ) + 1 ) < M <-> ( A mod M ) < ( M - 1 ) ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_biimp3ar | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ /\ ( A mod M ) < ( M - 1 ) ) -> ( ( A mod M ) + 1 ) < M ) |
| 22 |  | #P_modid | |- ( ( ( ( ( A mod M ) + 1 ) e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) /\ ( 0 <_ ( ( A mod M ) + 1 ) /\ ( ( A mod M ) + 1 ) < M ) ) -> ( ( ( A mod M ) + 1 ) mod M ) = ( ( A mod M ) + 1 ) ) |
| 23 | 12, 17, 21, 22 | #P_syl12anc | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ /\ ( A mod M ) < ( M - 1 ) ) -> ( ( ( A mod M ) + 1 ) mod M ) = ( ( A mod M ) + 1 ) ) |
